campaignMetadata.title: Example Testing Campaign
campaignMetadata.description: This campaign manifest is for demonstration and testing purposes only. It lists example domains and reasons.

targets.additionalDetails: This target is included solely for demonstrating how the Boycott Beacon extension displays information from a campaign manifest.
Including example.org helps ensure the extension correctly identifies different domains listed within the same campaign manifest.
This entry serves as another example within the test campaign manifest.
